title: Shard
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Shard

Shard may refer to:

  • Godsword shards:
    • Godsword shard 1
    • Godsword shard 2
    • Godsword shard 3
    • Godsword shards 1 & 2
    • Godsword shards 2 & 3
    • Godsword shards 1 & 3
  • Malediction and odium ward shards:
    • Malediction shard 1
    • Malediction shard 2
    • Malediction shard 3
    • Odium shard 1
    • Odium shard 2
    • Odium shard 3
  • Ancient shard, an item obtained in the Catacombs of Kourend.
  • Armour shard, an item used in the Another Slice of H.A.M. quest.
  • Astral rune shards, an item used in the Dream Mentor quest.
  • Barronite shards, an item obtained through various activities within the Ruins of Camdozaal.
  • Blood shard, an item used to upgrade the amulet of fury.
  • Bone shard, an item used in the Shilo Village quest.
  • Crystal shard, an item obtained through various activities within Prifddinas.
    • Crystal shards, obtained within The Gauntlet.
    • Corrupted shards, obtained within The Corrupted Gauntlet.
  • Daeyalt shard, an item obtained in the daeyalt essence mine.
  • Dragon metal shard, an item used in creating dragon platebodies or dragon kiteshields.
  • Gublinch shards, an item from the 2013 Christmas event.
  • Hallowed crystal shard, an item used to teleport to the Hallowed Sepulchre.
  • Lava scale shard, used to make extended antifires.
  • Rock-shell shard, an item used to make rock-shell platebodies.
  • Rune shards, an item used in the Garden of Tranquillity quest.
  • Salve shard, used to create a salve amulet.
  • Zalcano shard, used to create a dragon pickaxe (or).
  • Zenyte shard, used to make an uncut zenyte.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:

* [[Lava scale shard]], used to make [[extended antifire]]s.
* [[Rock-shell shard]], an item used to make [[rock-shell plate]]bodies.
* [[Rune shards]], an item used in the [[Garden of Tranquillity]] quest.

* [[Zalcano shard]], used to create a [[dragon pickaxe (or)]].
* [[Zenyte shard]], used to make an [[uncut zenyte]].
